entries.title: Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/AkikozZM/Changelog-App
entries.whats_new: Synchronization with main branch.
entries.impact: Ensures the codebase is up to date with main branch.

entries.title: Adjust the LLM model
entries.whats_new: Modified the language model configuration.
entries.impact: Improves language model functionality.

entries.title: Fix bugs on save to git method
entries.whats_new: Resolved issues related to saving data to Git repositories.
entries.impact: Ensures saving to Git repositories works correctly.

entries.title: Update changelog 2025-04-23
entries.whats_new: Refreshed the changelog entries for the day.
entries.impact: Keeps changelog information current.

entries.title: Fix bugs on save to git method
entries.whats_new: Further bug fixes related to Git save functionality.
entries.impact: Improves stability of saving to Git.

entries.title: Fixing LLM bugs
entries.whats_new: Resolved issues affecting the language model.
entries.impact: Enhances LLM performance and reliability.

entries.title: Update main.py
entries.whats_new: Updated the main application script.
entries.impact: Improves core application functionality.

entries.title: Fix bug of cannot save to github repo
entries.whats_new: Resolved an issue preventing saving to GitHub repositories.
entries.impact: Users can now save data directly to GitHub repositories.

entries.title: Save the cache to local perm
entries.whats_new: Implemented persistent caching locally.
entries.impact: Improves cache reliability and data persistence.

entries.title: Add some limit on entries
entries.whats_new: Introduced limits on the number of changelog entries.
entries.impact: Controls the size and manageability of changelog data.

entries.title: Keep the local generate cache strategy
entries.whats_new: Maintained the current cache generation strategy locally.
entries.impact: Ensures consistent cache management.

entries.title: Update main.py
entries.whats_new: Further updates to core script.
entries.impact: Enhances core application features.

entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Updated project dependencies.
entries.impact: Ensures compatibility with latest libraries.

entries.title: Interact with Railway and Github webhook
entries.whats_new: Enabled interaction with Railway deployment platform and Github webhooks.
entries.impact: Automates deployment and integration workflows.

entries.title: Deploy on Railway Ready
entries.whats_new: Deployment setup completed on Railway.
entries.impact: Allows for cloud deployment of the application.

entries.title: Back-end api deploy on Railway Success
entries.whats_new: Backend API successfully deployed on Railway platform.
entries.impact: Provides backend services accessible over the cloud.

entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Updated dependencies list.
entries.impact: Maintains environment stability.

entries.title: Python 3.11
entries.whats_new: Updated to Python version 3.11.
entries.impact: Ensures compatibility with Python 3.11 features.

entries.title: Create requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Generated the dependencies file.
entries.impact: Facilitates environment setup.

entries.title: Open Back-end API to other users
entries.whats_new: Made API accessible for external users.
entries.impact: This is a significant security and access change, potentially allowing external interactions with the API. Users need to be aware of new access permissions and security considerations.

entries.title: Collect interface to src\types.ts
entries.whats_new: Consolidated TypeScript interfaces into a single file for better management.
entries.impact: Simplifies interface management for front-end development.

entries.title: Polish Front-end Page
entries.whats_new: Enhanced visual design and added loading effects.
entries.impact: Provides a smoother user experience.

entries.title: Add more details on the Detail.tsx
entries.whats_new: Improved display of changelog details, including a floating navbar.
entries.impact: Improves readability and navigation in the UI.

entries.title: Changelog detail page implementation
entries.whats_new: Implemented detailed view of changelog entries; clicking entries now navigates to detailed log.
entries.impact: Navigation behavior in the changelog detail page has changed, affecting how users access logs.

entries.title: Use json cache strategy to connect front-end and back-end
entries.whats_new: Introduced caching using JSON files between front-end and back-end.
entries.impact: Changes how data is loaded; front-end now relies on cached files, which may affect real-time updates.

entries.title: Polish the Sidebar component. Basic layout of ChangelogOverview page
entries.whats_new: Enhanced sidebar layout for easier navigation.
entries.impact: Improves user navigation experience.

entries.title: Optimize constants to constants/index.tsx file
entries.whats_new: Refactored constants for better organization.
entries.impact: Supports easier maintenance and updates.

entries.title: Front-end layout implementation
entries.whats_new: Built sidebar and navigation layout, with collapsible features.
entries.impact: Provides a user-friendly interface for page navigation.

entries.title: Basic front-end web implementation
entries.whats_new: Created a basic web interface for viewing changelogs, with auto-generated content.
entries.impact: Users now see automated changelog content, altering previous manual update processes.

entries.title: Update the llm and schemas
entries.whats_new: Enhanced language model and schemas supporting automatic detection of breaking changes.
entries.impact: Introduces automated breaking change detection, which may affect how commit changes are reported.

entries.title: Second version of LLM, delete cache
entries.whats_new: Updated language model version and removed cache.
entries.impact: Improves language model accuracy and system performance.

entries.title: Update git ignore
entries.whats_new: Modified .gitignore file.
entries.impact: Prevents certain files from being tracked by Git.

entries.title: Basic back-end api implemented
entries.whats_new: Backend API functionalities are now available.
entries.impact: Provides necessary backend support.

entries.title: Initialize app
entries.whats_new: Initial application setup completed.
entries.impact: Sets foundation for development.
